All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Athlete
This class implements an Athlete that can participate in debates
AthleteCreator
this class defines the athlete creator, a tool used to generate athletes
AthleteTrainingScreen
This class defines the athlete training screen where the player can train one of their athletes to increase their stats
Book
This class implements a Book item that boosts offence stat
ClubScreen
this class implements the club where the player can look at the properties of their team, and choose their current speakers
GameLogic
This class defines most of the games functionality
InsufficientBalanceException
This class implements InsufficientBalanceException which is used to show when the user doesn't have enough money to buy something
Inventory
this class defines the inventory screen where the player can use items
Item
This abstract class implements Item objects that can boost athlete stats
MainMenuScreen
this class implements the main menu screen where the player can choose what they want to do, view their team, view their inventory, go to the market, go to the stadium, and take a by
Market
This class implements the Market where items and athletes can be sold and purchased
MarketScreen
this class defines the market screen where the player can buy and sell items and athletes
Match
This Class defines a Match in where the player team debates against an oppositions team based on a moot
Moot
This class implements a moot the is used in matches between teams of debators
PlayerTeam
this class implements the PlayerTeam which is extends the Team class, it defines the functionality of the players team
Price
defines the price
RandomEvent
this class implements the random events that can happen when the player takes a by
Refill
This class implements a Refill item that boosts defence stat
SetupScreen
this class implements the setup screen where the player can choose their team name, desired season length, and difficulty
StadiumScreen
this class implements the Stadium, where the player can play one out of the three available matches each week
Team
A team of debaters used to play matches
Timer
This class implements a Timer item that boosts stamina stat
WaterBottle
This class implements a Water Bottle item that boosts speaking style stat
